alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 11:10PM CDT until April 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Green Lake County in south central Wisconsin... Western Fond du Lac County in east central Wisconsin... Eastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... Marquette County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1110 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Wisconsin Dells to near Rio to near Columbus, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Waupun, Portage, Ripon, Berlin, North Fond Du Lac, Columbus, Pardeeville, Randolph, Fall River, Montello, Markesan, Westfield, Princeton, Rosendale, Rio, Green Lake, Brandon, Cambria, and Southern Lake Winnebago. This includes the following Locations Historic Indian Agency House, French Creek Wildlife Area, Alliant Energy Portage Power Plant, and Puckaway Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Dodge; Fond du Lac; Green Lake; Marquette
